title: FPS drop after 8.1
body:
After installing this patch, my FPS would drop. If I’m walking to lane Ill be around 160 FPS and right when I dashed on Yasuo, my FPS would go down to about 20 and my screen would freeze and skip the animation. I tried making the quality of everything low but it would still be the same thing. Every time I attacked a creep or did something other than walking, my FPS would drop.
Can anyone help me with this because I don’t know if ill be able to play another league game if this doesn’t go away.

Thanks

replies.body: So it basically sounds like your FPS drops when you do almost *anything* in the game right? I'd definitely start with checking for any missed drivers updates as well as DirectX to cover the basics. I'm also a little curious if this might be some packet loss, so let's have you use this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to scan your recent games if you could.
